author: John T Bennett
title: Coronavirus: Trump considers clamping down on air travel but opposes nationwide stay-at-home order
description: Donald Trump announced he is considering clamping down on domestic air travel – especially flights between cities hit hardest by coronavirus – but he made clear he opposes issuing a national stay-at-home order amid the pandemic outbreak.
content:
Donald Trump announced he is considering clamping down on domestic air travel especially flights between cities hit hardest by coronavirus but he made clear he opposes issuing a national stay-at-home order amid the pandemic outbreak.
